titleStmt.title: A pindarick ode on the sacred memory of our late Gracious Sovereign King Charles II to which is added, another essay on the same occasion, by Sir F.F. Knight of the Bath.
titleStmt.author: Fane, Francis, Sir, d. 1689?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Playford for Henry Playford ...,
